summary: Dying Breed interweaves the two most fascinating icons of Tasmanian history: the extinct Tasmanian tiger and "The Pieman" (aka Alexander Pearce) who was hanged for cannibalism in 1824. ... See full summary »
cast: Nathan Phillips|Leigh Whannell|Bille Brown|Mirrah Foulkes|Melanie Vallejo|Ken Radley|Elaine Hudson|Sheridan Harvey|Peter Docker|Boris Brkic|Phillip McInnes|Ian 'Paddy' McIvor|James Portanier|Sally McDonald|Peter Finlay|Christopher Stevenson|Ian Scott|Des Fleming|Michelle Jones|Pamela Achesonharding|Brendan Donoghue|Reg Evans|Dylan Lloyd|Tim Harris|Andy Poulter|Greg Parker|Tim Stitz|Steven Haar
title: Dying Breed
